page.title: 16PLANNED BYPASS,A30,ST.ALLEN.
page.content: The A30 trunkroad is the main "spine" through Cornwall,in places a 2-lane country road,elsewhere a modern 6-lane road by-passing towns & villages to cope with heavy holiday traffic & big lorries.A plan to by-pass the bottle- neck at Zelah for 2 miles has its preferred route south over Nancarrow & Boswellick farmland in this block(+ Tolgroggan & Trevalso).Plans were on show in Zelah village hall.Farmers have united to fight these plans by: trying to collect information from Min.of Transport;writing to Min.of Environment,Min.of Agriculture,local councils & Truro M.P.David Penhaligon; investigating the possibility of route N.of the present A30.They hope for a public enquiry. Financial compensation based on market price of agric. land for loss of 10acres at Nancarrow does not make up for land severance & loss.
